titleStmt.title: A celestiall glasse, or, Ephemeris for the year of the Christian era 1652 being the bissextile or leap-year : contayning the lunations, planetary motions, configurations & ecclipses for this present year ... : with many other things very delightfull and necessary for most sorts of men : calculated exactly and composed for ... Rochester ... / by Robert Sliter.
titleStmt.author: Sliter, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
